name: Smile Machine
tag_list: digital, production, mobile, tablet, web, design, development, innovation, app
overview:
Smile Machine are digital production experts, bridging the gap between technology, creativity and business.

They have a full range of skills and experience, and make all sorts of goodies, ranging from engaging mobile apps, to immersive tablet experiences, and user-friendly websites. Smile Machine are lucky enough to work with some of the industryâ€™s brightest superstars, from agencies big and small. Whether engaging visitors at an event, increasing the reach of a brand, or visualizing innovative new products, Smile Machine pride themselves on coming up with beautiful solutions that work.

Core Competencies & Skills: Mobile, Web and Tablet Development; Design; CMS; Video; Innovation.
